programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When the twins forget an important gadget needed for Ayanas school play, Jonathan must leave in the middle of the play to get it from the Dream Factory, leaving Drew to not only play his role in the show, but to unexpectedly play Jonathans role as well.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week, we explore why Afrodescendants from the Americas and beyond, are choosing to leave their lives in the West to return to their ancestral Africa. We meet a single mother who traded life in Canada for a fresh start in Kenya and a filmmaker who returned to her roots in Sierra Leone. In Ghana, we hear from some of the over 1,000 African Americans now calling it home.

programme.desc: Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs preydetecting pressure sensors.

programme.desc: Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come facetoface.

programme.title: ROUX DOWN THE RIVER THE THAMES

programme.desc: Nothing but the best tracks and ultimate anthems from the 90s.

programme.title: Girl Power Hour!
programme.desc: ZigAZigah! Its all about girl power! Tune in for all the biggest girl power hits from the 90s.

programme.title: Saved By The 90s!
programme.desc: The 90s are here to save us, so enjoy these giant hits from a golden decade of music.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest HipHop, R&B, KPop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2015
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2015 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Drake & Friends
programme.desc: Weve got some of Drakes hottest videos right now, and weve brought some of his famous friends along for the ride too!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: After a lifetimes work, dairy farmer Yoshikawa Yuji was diagnosed with cancer and had to retire. As his son takes over the farm, what joys and struggles does he encounter?

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyoe producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyoe artist Sharakus debut work The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two foreigners in Tokyo. Former amateur champion dancer Daga Rutkowska from Poland trains with a paraathlete for a blind dance competition, and Chinese Zhang Ye works for a literary agency.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese Kimono
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to kimono. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: 36 From what time to what time can we use the bath? To ask when something is open or available, put wa after the name of something, then nanji kara nanji made desu ka.

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russias invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLDJAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of NHK NEWSLINE and the launch of NHK NEWS 7. We also feature Japan in Focus moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: A sleeping spider squats Rons swing, and he cant take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she cant locate the key...

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isnt easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes ice pops but cant wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island! Blaze and his crew must find the missing pieces of their ship so they can sail home.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Its a headtohead showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle ziplining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocketpowered ATV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Fertilizer causes Yumis crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs a lot of pizzas, fast! But when Speed Meister steps in, the pups have to fix his pizza problem. When a family cant get to the airport in time on Speed Meisters road, Rubble & Crew has to build a new road before takeoff.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission to Secret Shores so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town longer than they anticipated.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mikas mind through a spooky VR video game. Its up to Danger Force to exercise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before theyre all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henrys life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte gets increasingly suspicious about the secrets hes been hiding.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Ninja Turtles are on the run and...alone. Leonardo is a leader but who is he without anyone to lead? Leo now has to stop Bishop and her Mechazoids while trying to save his brothers.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carl takes Rosas chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Fridas fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildrens attention. Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think hes their mama!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove to Willow that alchemy is more powerful than her natural magic. Brainys new brainweighing invention backfires and leaves him brainless.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners. Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.
